metadata¶

class txpipe.metadata.TXTracerMetadata(args, comm=None)[source]¶

Bases: txpipe.base_stage.PipelineStage

This stage doesn’t actually calculate anything, it just collates together metadata about our sources, so that we don’t need to pass around catalog sized objects as much.
